website_summaries.verdict: Performance-wise, the Chaco Odyssey sports a lot of qualities that endears it to the outdoor community. Its lightness, arch support, and comfy confines are just some of the reasons why the adventurers positively receive it. However, there are a couple of drawbacks to this footgear, mainly its long strap.. Nevertheless, with the outstanding pros of the Chaco Odyssey, getting a pair may result to a satisfying experience with it during a trip.
pros: The Chaco Odyssey's lightweight design leaves a lot of wearers in awe
Many hikers mention that it is indeed an astonishingly comfortable sandal for hiking
The ample arch support of the Odyssey surprises numerous online buyers
The Odyssey from Chaco impresses hordes of owners with its stylish look and colorways
A great deal of verified purchasers testify that there was no need for a break-in period
The versatility and amphibious performance of the Chaco Odyssey pleases umpteen users and an expert
Most wearers appreciate its closed-toe design which renders a decent amount of protection
cons: Several buyers wish that there was a way to tuck the excess strap after tightening the fit
It is a bit difficult to expel loose rocks and debris once they sneak inside the Chaco Odyssey, according to a couple of gear testers
A few trail enthusiasts say that the outsole performs poorly on wet and slippery surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Good Looking Sandal
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a brief trip to Europe (because I wanted something comfortable) and have already worn them. No need to break them in, however, and I look forward to wearing them in Croatia, France, and Germany. They are not sexy, but then neither am I!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of Chaco's and I am very pleased. Really good looking sandal and comfortable. I usually wear 9.5 but Chaco's didn't have half sizes so I went up to 10, good thing I did, they fit perfect, so Chacos may run on the small side in length. Bought the wax teal color which is very pretty. A few reviews complained about the strap being long, and it is when you tighten up the strap, but for heavens sake just tuck it under and its fine.
customer_reviews.author: wyomingwoman

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful if you love their sandals
customer_reviews.text: Very similar to another Chaco sandals. They hit it out of the park with this closed toe sandal! As a medical professional it's important to have comfy shoes at work. Thankful these work for me! The only down side is sweaty feet but other than that they're amazing!
customer_reviews.author: marlie_mae

customer_reviews.title: Soooo comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I’m on my feet all day doing physical therapy and my feet feel so good! Great investment
customer_reviews.author: S W D

customer_reviews.title: Chaco is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was sent a size 9 and I asked for a size 8. These were huge. Now I’m not sure wheater I should ask for and 8 or a 7? So I ordered a size 7 and they are soooooo comfortabl! I would buy these again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of the Chaco’s sandals but they dont really compare. The rubber footbed felt softer and a more flexible footbed. I have wide feet but they felt try to size. I also didn’t have the issue with a ridiculously long strap that others described. They also felt different in the arch support. It was a little strange at first but was just fine. No break in period was needed. My wife loved hers so much I got a pair too! Overall they are great shoes for any activity
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Support and comfort is the most important component for me.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about these shoes. They are supportive of my high arches, good looking with a dress or skirt and my other shoes are crying in my closet because I where these non-stop!!! Please make them in other colors for women!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Slip on Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I get so many compliments on them. They are perfect for biking, running, and hiking. They are good to wear in all different types of weather. You can even wear them as water shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal for winter in Kauai
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip to Kauai. They were perfect for the rainy/muddy weather in the winter time. Only problem is I got a blister on my small toe after long hikes, however would still recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great arch support and pretty and plenty plenty of toe room
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable, plenty of toe room, and good arch support. upper material is soft enough and the strap is easy to adjust. and very nice multi-color band very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: a home owner

customer_reviews.title: Strap is WAY TOO long!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable except the strap is WAY TOO long! It hangs about 3 inches off the edge. You could cut it off. But after paying $80, I really don’t want to do that. It’s a fall hazard for sure. Will be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Aubree Earnest

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: Arch in sandal did not align with my foot’s arch, therefore uncomfortable even when I tried a size down (7). Wide toe bed which was good. Strap is way long. Good sole. Just generally not a good fit for my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for wide toes high arch
customer_reviews.text: Shoe gave me perfect balance after femur surgery. Toe box is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca jetton

customer_reviews.title: Ouches
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a few months - I work in a garden full time so my feet are wet a lot. I am still getting blisters and raw spots on my feet from these - sole is starting to come apart from left shoe. Mesh is pulling from right shoe. Good support though
customer_reviews.author: Belinda J. Coker

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, awesome arch support and well made, will be back for more
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Clement

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes for kayaking and paddle boarding!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Chacos! They work for me because they are not as heavy as Keens.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Elly Giraldo

customer_reviews.title: Fits very comfortably
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasn’t sure then after I wore them for a day. I loved them
customer_reviews.author: raindrop

customer_reviews.title: Amazing arch support!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, and amazing arch support! I have custom insoles that I put in all my shoes, when I tried these on for the first time it felt like my insoles were already in them!! I can't wait to go hiking!!
customer_reviews.author: Bama Bound 96

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable and versatile! I have battled plantar fasciitis on and off for years, and these have really kept the pain down. I’ve already ordered another pair!
customer_reviews.author: JessicaT

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Have numerous chaco. This shoe was uncomfortable just trying on.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Turpin

customer_reviews.title: Color, style and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for everyday wear, not just for hiking. I love the color, style and comfort !!️
customer_reviews.author: Mildred C. Price

customer_reviews.title: ok for the store, not for hiking
customer_reviews.text: not a secure fit for hiking, ok around the house and shopping
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Howard

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe with good arch support!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got my new Chacos on today...im sitting on a bench waiting on a shuttle bus and a lady driving by yells to me..."your shoes are cute!" I yelled back they are Chacos and they feel good on....and they do!!!! Chacos really did it this time...these are great shoes with each support. I own several pairs of the sandals but these my favorite shoes now!! I'm gonna get another pair before they stop making this design.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WATER SHOE~EXCELLENT ARCH SUPPORT~A LITTLE HARD TO GET INTO
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with these shoes, which I bought for water aerobics. I have a high arch and a high instep (don't know if that's the right term--the tops of my feet are high). The arch support is excellent, but because the top of the shoe is very full--stops right in front of my ankle--I have kind of a hard time wiggling my feet into them. I think I need to buy a shoe horn. They do retain a lot of water once I'm out of the pool, but that's OK. Also, the people who left reviews about the adjustment strap being super long are right. Mine don't drag on the floor, but they're pretty close. Strange.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Somin

customer_reviews.title: Summer sandles
customer_reviews.text: Half size too big. Needs a cotton insole so toes don't sweat. Gonna add a insole for the size difference and comfort
customer_reviews.author: GwennyMack

customer_reviews.title: Too big for narrow foot.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was too long and I ordered my usual size. Also too wide and had to adjust the strap all the way and then it was way too long and it wouldn’t stay tucked into the side of the shoe. I could tell they would be a comfy hiker but my foot is just very narrow.
customer_reviews.author: KL Ross

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for anything outdoors!!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 9.5/10 and I have a wide foot and I ordered a 9. It’s fit great, I wish the back was a little tighter and the straps could be tightened but you can tighten the top straps a little. Other than that, these are perfect for anything outdoors and feel high quality. My foot was sore the first time I wore them but after that I wore them 6-8 hours and no issues. You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Geena Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for every day and every challenge...
customer_reviews.text: I love wearing these shoes whenever I need a little more support than lightweight sandals! They are super comfortable and great for summer hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Lorene M.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These “water shoes” exceeded my expectations! They are comfortable, flattering, and have a great arch support. They can be worn with or without socks.
customer_reviews.author: Heather A. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sandals
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfortable sandal. I can wear them all day and feet fell good. True to size, I wear an 8 or 81/2, I favor more towards the 8. I don’t have a wide or fat food, I am medium width. Daughter wears a 9 and hers fit her too.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Loved them
customer_reviews.text: I love love these chacos!! Got them cheaper here on Amazon! Even got a matching pair for my man!! Delivery was quick as well!
customer_reviews.author: Lulie DeGuzman

customer_reviews.title: TRUE To Size.  Do Not Size Down.
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT size down. Shoes are true to size. I listened to the reviews that said size down and Im waiting my time and Amazon's as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome. I love them so much! They arrived very quickly and are worth every dollar. Breathable, comfortable ,and high quality!
customer_reviews.author: jhchyn

customer_reviews.title: Really cute sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of these sandals. They fit great. I have received compliments on them . I really like them better than I thought I would. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: C Baskin

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: Buy a size smaller these sandals look and feel great worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Barney

customer_reviews.title: Just say no!
customer_reviews.text: Why the long strap that you can’t cut and drags the ground¿
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice style
customer_reviews.text: Too wide and seemed sized for men, nice design though!
customer_reviews.author: Pat F

customer_reviews.title: Can hike in these for miles
customer_reviews.text: Love these.. I wear a 7.5, but the last pair of chances I ordered were 7.5 and were a bit tight, these I ordered in an 8 and they are a bit large... but I can hike for miles in them.
customer_reviews.author: Taesha Arnold

customer_reviews.title: A must have shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Chaco shoes are my wife’s favorite. Our puppy chewed up her favorite ones. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald C. Maupin

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Straps a little long, but very comfortable and true to size. I’m a size 8 and it fits great!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaci King

customer_reviews.title: Light wait and fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: So comfy and light wait! Can’t wait to go hiking in them! So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alaina Smoczyk

customer_reviews.title: Run large
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 8 normally, but I read it somewhere that these shoes run large. So, I got size 7 and they perfectly fit! The straps were a little too long, but I rolled them up and tucked them under the buckles to solve the problem! The shoes look better in person and they’re super comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arches give great support
customer_reviews.text: Liked that these Chaco Odyssey had covered toed n had some arch in the footbed...but my pinky toe rubbed a bit...better with socks on. Like these over the Keens bc these have some arches...helps feet not be in pain as much besides the pinky toe rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

product_meta.title: Chaco - Women's Odyssey
product_meta.description: This sandal by Chaco comes in an array of colors. Comfort for all day wear.
feature_bullets: UPPER: Breathable mesh upper with polyester jacquard webbing, Synthetic overlays for added structure and toe protection
MIDSOLE: Women's specific LUVSEAT dual density EVR midsole, Antimicrobial application for odor control, Vegan-friendly construction
OUTSOLE: Non-marking ChacoGrip Plus rubber compound, 2.5mm lug depth
